entries.@rd01_proto_description: Stationary explosive device that must be activated manually with a wireless detonator.
entries.@shield01_description: Wearable zero gravity generator. Stops bullets and projectiles directed at the operator.
entries.@refill02_description: Instant reloading tool. Refills ammo in the equipped weapon.
entries.@mk04_description: All-purpose medicinal aerosol. Heals allies in a small radius.
entries.@tb03_description: Instantly displace yourself several meters ahead, dealing moderate damage along your path.
entries.@pd01_description: Experimental tactical device. Disintegrates hostile gadgets and projectiles in a small radius around the operator.
entries.@spw01_description: Experimental power weapon by CPL. Emits a beam of healing energy. Equips in the sidearm slot.
entries.@spw02_description: Experimental power weapon by CPL. Emits a beam of charged Crystalline particles. Equips in the sidearm slot.
entries.@axe02_description: Throwing axe with an unstable explosive charge.
entries.@gr_frag02_description: Offensive grenade that deals massive damage in a small area.
entries.@flg01_description: Non-lethal explosive device, used to temporarily disorient an enemy.
entries.@spg02_description: Throwable device with a dose of sterile Crystalline. Creates a time-limited barrier in a specified spot.
entries.@medkit_description: Personal first aid kit for tactical casualty care.
entries.@resurrection_drone_description: Portable drone, programmed to revive fallen teammates.
entries.@ik01_description: A dose of Red Salt which causes rapid growth of spikes out of the body, and grants a significant armor boost for a short time.
entries.@ik02_description: Experimental multi-spectral camouflage, which makes the operator barely visible to the enemy.
entries.@ik03_description: Gravitational wave that knocks back enemies.
entries.@sg01_description: Canister-type grenade used as a signaling, marking, or screening device for unit movements.
entries.@spg01_description: Throwable device with a dose of active Crystalline. Causes a rapid sprout growth in a small area.
entries.@spg05_description: A tactical incarnation of the Molotov cocktail. Sets the enemy on fire.
entries.@spg07_description: Throwable device, filled with a swarm of vicious Crystalline-transformed insects.
entries.@spg08_description: Grenade that causes a series of directed explosions in a straight line.
entries.@spg09_description: Stationary electronic device that shocks enemies in the area of effect with electrical discharges.
entries.@spg10_description: Throwable device that slows down enemies and temporarily prevents them from using special abilities.
entries.@spg11_description: Throwable device with a dose of sterile Crystalline. Creates a time-limited sprout cover in a specified spot.
entries.@smg01_description: Classic submachine gun by Cinetech. Low recoil and high rate of fire.
entries.@ar01_description: A modern incarnation of the famous Soviet assault rifle.
entries.@lmg01_proto_description: Fully automatic infantry firearm. Excels at suppressing fire.
entries.@ar02_description: A special modification of the XM rifle series, best suited for burst-fire.
entries.@ar03_description: Legendary skin for the XM-40 Conciliator. Play fair, win with dignity.
entries.@ar04_description:
Modern automatic rifle by FDI. Export modification, which became popular after the Strafe.
• The highest effective firing range among Assault rifles.
entries.@pt01_description: Technically and morally obsolete sidearm designed before the Strafe.
entries.@pt04_description: Six-round revolver. High power, high accuracy, and a smooth double-action mechanism.
entries.@pt11_description:
Reliable and balanced, this handgun earned the reputation of Shellguard's weapon of choice.
• The highest rate of fire among Sidearms.
entries.@shg01_description: Renowned pump-action shotgun by Berlington Gunslinger.
entries.@sr01_description: Modification of the renowned American bolt-action rifle by Gunyard, Inc.
entries.@sr03_proto_description: Semi-automatic sniper rifle with high rate of fire.
entries.@sr04_proto_description: Semi-automatic sniper rifle with low recoil.
entries.@cm01_description: Stationary anti-personnel mine. Automatically activates on enemy proximity.
entries.@sr02_description: Heavy sniper rifle by Surpuissance Solutions. One shot - one kill.
entries.@kn01_description: Tactical knife with a serrated edge. Ideal for close quarters combat.
entries.@sr03_description:
Next-gen semi-automatic marksman rifle.
• The highest rate of fire among semi-auto rifles.
• Temporarily slows down the enemy upon hit.
entries.@ult_sr05_description: Fast and lethal bolt-action rifle designed for Crystalline-infused ammo.
entries.@trap01_description: Anti-personnel mine that encases an enemy into a dense Crystalline outgrowth.
entries.@gl01_description: Semi-automatic 40 mm grenade launcher loaded with proximity-sensitive grenades.
entries.@ha01_description: Portable device that restores allies' HP and reduces incoming damage by 20% within the area of effect.
entries.@ult_pt03_description: Experimental revolver, loaded with Crystalline projectiles. Each projectile leaves a trace of deadly energy along its path.
entries.@hmg02_description: High speed six-barrel heavy machine gun.
entries.@shg02_description: Launches burning Crystalline projectiles that deal damage over time.
entries.@smg02_description:
Military submachine gun by Zimmer & Bauer.
• The highest accuracy among Submachine guns.
entries.@shg04_description:
Pump-action shotgun by Abelli, originally designed for private military companies.
• The highest base damage among Shotguns.
entries.@smg03_description:
Top-rated submachine gun by Gunyard. Used by various military divisions.
• The highest rate of fire among Submachine guns.
entries.@kdr01_description: Tag-along combat drone that follows the owner and attacks their enemies.
entries.@fdr01_description: Compact UAV, programmed to track the enemy and reveal their location to the operator.
entries.@ar06_description:
Next-gen army assault rifle by Aesthetic Engineering.
• The highest base damage among non-burst Assault rifles.
entries.@ar06_epic01_description: Epic skin for the Λ-7 Ghost. See you later, alligator.
entries.@ar06_leg01_description: Legendary skin for the Λ-7 Ghost. Brace for impact!
entries.@ar07_description:
Fast and lightweight multi-purpose rifle by Aesthetic Engineering.
• Burst weapon with the highest base damage among Assault rifles.
entries.@ar08_description:
Highly efficient and ergonomic rifle by Aesthetic Engineering.
• The highest rate of fire among Assault rifles.
entries.@ar08_leg01_description: Legendary skin for the Λ-9 Legatus. Deep stranglehold.
entries.@sr06_description:
High caliber sniper rifle by Precision Armaments.
• Burst weapon with the highest effective range among semi-auto rifles.
entries.@sr07_description:
Semi-automatic sniper rifle with high rate of fire.
• Temporarily slows down the enemy upon hit.
entries.@sr07_leg01_description: Legendary skin for the Zangor Z-300. Blow off some steam!
entries.@sr08_description:
High-grade semi-automatic marksman rifle.
• The highest base damage among semi-auto rifles.
• Temporarily slows down the enemy upon hit.
entries.@sr08_leg01_description: Legendary skin for the Impala by Zangor. Release the Kraken!
entries.@sr10_description:
Classic military sniper rifle with a sliding bolt system.
• The highest rate of fire among bolt-action rifles.
entries.@shg05_description:
Latest generation tactical shotgun by Abelli.
• Burst-fire weapon with the highest magazine capacity among Shotguns.
entries.@shg06_description:
High-speed semi-automatic shotgun by Surpuissance Solutions.
• The highest rate of fire among Shotguns.
entries.@shg06_leg01_description: Legendary skin for the R21 Brute. On both sides of the barricade.
entries.@shg07_description:
Heavy semi-automatic shotgun by Surpuissance Solutions.
• The most evenly balanced weapon stats among Shotguns.
entries.@shg08_description:
Powerful and reliable pump-action shotgun by Berlington Gunslinger.
• The best stability among Shotguns.
entries.@shg08_leg01_description: Legendary skin for the Berlington TAC. Caught in a web with embedded spiders.
entries.@smg04_description:
Renowned submachine gun by Aesthetic Engineering designed for special forces.
• The highest effective range among Submachine guns.
entries.@smg05_description:
Heavy submachine gun by Gunyard equipped with a recoil compensation system.
• The highest magazine capacity among Submachine guns.
entries.@pt05_description:
Compact and reliable pistol by Hellenius Arms.
• The highest accuracy among Sidearms.
entries.@pt05_leg01_description: Legendary skin for the G5 Earl. Honor above all!
entries.@ar05_description:
Compact assault rifle by FDI. Created for comfortable shooting.
• The highest stability among Assault rifles.
entries.@ar05_leg01_description: Legendary skin for the XM-27 Pacifier. For honor and glory!
entries.@shg04_leg01_description: Legendary skin for the Black Falcon II. You've got the power.
entries.@smg02_leg01_description: Legendary skin for the Drachen by Zimmer & Bauer. Maximum speed.
entries.@smg03_leg01_description: Legendary skin for the Firespray by Gunyard. Nobility and class.
entries.@smg04_leg01_description: Legendary skin for the Λ-1 Centurion. Terrifying power of spin.
entries.@chosen_parasite_gun_description: Experimental Chosen weapon. Produces energy spheres that discharge electromagnetic impulses in a small radius.
entries.@shg05_leg01_description: Legendary skin for the M2 Tactical SAS. All systems go!
entries.@smg06_description:
Classic submachine gun by Cinetech.
• The highest base damage among Submachine guns.
entries.@sr03_leg01_description: Legendary skin for the Presarm VX-7. Death levels all men.
entries.@ar07_leg01_description: Legendary skin for the Λ-3 Pilum. Woodwork to behold.
entries.@pt07_description:
Powerful and reliable revolver by Vognepal.
• The highest base damage among Sidearms.
entries.@smg06_leg01_description: Legendary skin for the Cinetech M5. Life is a comedy.
entries.@pt07_leg01_description: Legendary skin for the U44 Culverina. Build your own future.
entries.@shg07_leg01_description: Legendary skin for the R60 Gevaudan. Let them hear you roar!
entries.@pt06_description:
Ergonomic burst pistol by Hellenius. Lightweight, and perfectly sits in the hand.
• The highest ammo capacity among Sidearms.
entries.@pt06_epic01_description: Epic skin for the G9 Kungen. See you later, alligator.
entries.@pt06_leg01_description: Legendary skin for the G9 Kungen. Live fast, die young.
entries.@dash01_description: Integrated jetpack, which allows the operator to lunge into a specified spot, dealing massive area damage.
entries.@sr06_leg01_description: Legendary skin for the Dragonfly by Presarm. Beauty amidst the storm of war.
entries.@ar09_description:
A modern incarnation of the famous Soviet assault rifle. True military classics reimagined by Cinetech.
• The highest precision damage among Assault rifles.
entries.@smg05_leg01_description: Legendary skin for the Tornado by Gunyard. Don't forget to refuel.
entries.@sr09_description: Limited-edition sniper rifle by Precision Armaments. A collector's piece among the sniper elite.
entries.@pt10_description:
Six-round revolver. High power with a smooth double-action mechanism.
• The highest effective range among Sidearms.
entries.@pt10_leg01_description: Legendary skin for the U22 Svarog. A symbol of power for a true Ataman.
entries.@pt12_description:
A time-proven instrument of vengeance. Old, but troubleproof.
• Unique double-barrel shotgun which can be used as a secondary weapon.
entries.@sr11_description:
Armor-piercing sniper rifle with devastating firepower.
• The highest base damage among bolt-action rifles.
entries.@sr11_leg01_description: Legendary skin for the SAG-8 Reaper. They see you rollin'. They hatin'.
entries.@ar05_epic01_description: Epic skin for the XM-27 Pacifier. Pacify till the world shatters.
entries.@ar05_epic03_description: Epic skin for the XM-27 Pacifier. Nobody calls you chicken.
entries.@pt05_epic01_description: Epic skin for the G5 Earl. Let the wisdom of the dragon guide you.
entries.@shg08_epic01_description: Epic skin for the Berlington TAC. Shoot first, ask questions later.
entries.@shg08_epic02_description: Epic skin for the Berlington TAC. Unleash the might of the ages!
entries.@smg02_epic01_description: Epic skin for the Z-940 Drachen. Feel the power coursing through your veins.
entries.@smg02_epic02_description: Epic skin for the Z-940 Drachen. The monsieur is a connoisseur.
entries.@sr08_epic01_description: Epic skin for the Impala by Zangor. Natural beauty in every shot.
entries.@sr08_epic02_description: Epic skin for the Impala by Zangor. Make a wish and pull the trigger.
entries.@ar09_epic01_description: Epic skin for the Zenith by Cinetech. The monsieur is a connoisseur.
entries.@pt10_epic01_description: Epic skin for the U22 Svarog. A subtle combination of power and class.
entries.@pt10_epic02_description: Epic skin for the U22 Svarog. The stars have aligned in your favor.
entries.@shg07_epic01_description: Epic skin for the R60 Gevaudan. They've come to the wrong neighborhood.
entries.@smg06_epic01_description: Epic skin for the Cinetech M5. Nobody calls you chicken.
entries.@sr03_epic01_description: Epic skin for the Presarm VX-7. You're addicted to it, but you know that it's toxic.
entries.@sr03_epic02_description: Epic skin for the Presarm VX-7. Feel the power coursing through your veins.
entries.@smg03_epic01_description: Epic skin for the Firespray by Gunyard. Ready, steady, go!
entries.@ar04_epic01_description: Epic skin for the XM-40 Conciliator. Great vengeance and furious anger.
entries.@shg04_epic01_description: Epic skin for the Black Falcon II. The whole galaxy in a single gun.
entries.@ar04_leg01_description: Legendary skin for the XM-40 Conciliator. One king to rule them all.
entries.@sr10_leg01_description: Legendary skin for the TWD X-Treme. A real predator doesn't need a pack.
entries.@sr10_epic01_description: Epic skin for the TWD X-Treme. Great vengeance and furious anger.
entries.@sr10_epic02_description: Epic skin for the TWD X-Treme. A little extra to burn your foes.
entries.@ar07_epic01_description: Epic skin for the Λ-3 Pilum. Not so cute when you see it in action.
entries.@ar08_epic01_description: Epic skin for the Λ-9 Legatus. Feel the power coursing through your veins.
entries.@ar08_epic02_description: Epic skin for the Λ-9 Legatus. They've come to the wrong neighborhood.
entries.@smg04_epic01_description: Epic skin for the Λ-1 Centurion. Make art, not vandalism.
entries.@shg05_epic01_description: Epic skin for the M2 Tactical SAS. Every pixel matters!
entries.@shg05_epic02_description: Epic skin for the M2 Tactical SAS. Feel the power coursing through your veins.
entries.@sr11_epic01_description: Epic skin for the SAG-8 Reaper. They've come to the wrong neighborhood.
entries.@sr11_epic02_description: Epic skin for the SAG-8 Reaper. The monsieur is a connoisseur.
entries.@sr06_epic01_description: Epic skin for the Dragonfly by Presarm. The stars have aligned in your favor.
entries.@sr06_epic02_description: Epic skin for the Dragonfly by Presarm. A crescendo of skill.
entries.@pt11_epic01_description: Epic skin for the G7 Springer. Nobody calls you chicken.
entries.@pt11_epic02_description: Epic skin for the G7 Springer. The whole galaxy in a single gun.
entries.@pt11_leg01_description: Legendary skin for the G7 Springer. Tremble before the primal might.
entries.@pt07_epic01_description: Epic skin for the U44 Culverina. Shoot'em up 'til the world shatters.
entries.@pt12_epic01_description: Epic skin for the Lupara Compatta. Vengeance is best served cold.
entries.@pt12_leg01_description: Legendary skin for the Lupara Compatta. When the eyes of God look upon you.
entries.@ar09_leg01_description: Legendary skin for the Zenith by Cinetech. Behold the power of an ancient creature.
entries.@smg05_epic01_description: Epic skin for the Tornado by Gunyard. Those sweet tunes of your childhood.
entries.@smg05_epic02_description: Epic skin for the Tornado by Gunyard. They've come to the wrong neighborhood.
entries.@shg06_epic01_description: Epic skin for the R21 Brute. The monsieur is a connoisseur.
entries.@shg06_epic02_description: Epic skin for the R21 Brute. Make a wish and pull the trigger.
entries.@leap02_description: Offensive maneuver, which allows you to quickly get into melee range with an opponent.
entries.@shg07_epic02_description: Epic skin for the R60 Gevaudan. Even more dangerous.
entries.@pt05_epic02_description: Epic skin for the G5 Earl. They've come to the wrong neighborhood.
entries.@ar09_epic02_description: Epic skin for the Zenith by Cinetech. The whole galaxy in a single gun.
entries.@pt12_epic02_description: Epic skin for the Lupara Compatta. The monsieur is a connoisseur.
entries.@smg04_epic02_description: Epic skin for the Λ-1 Centurion. Great vengeance and furious anger.
entries.@ar07_epic02_description: Epic skin for the Λ-3 Pilum. A little extra to burn your foes.
entries.@shg04_epic02_description: Epic skin for the Black Falcon II. Scratch off the rust, and it will shine again.
entries.@smg03_epic02_description: Epic skin for the Firespray. See you later, alligator.
entries.@ar04_epic02_description: Epic skin for the XM-40 Conciliator. Roam with the dragons.
entries.@smg06_epic02_description: Epic skin for the Cinetech M5. Cloudy with a chance of crystals.
entries.@kn06_description: Multi-purpose army knife. Equally good for cutting reeds and close quarters combat.
entries.@kn07_description: Tactical katana with Crystalline coating. Cuts through glass like knife through butter.
entries.@kn08_description: Just like the throwing axe, this one is also pretty self-explanatory.
entries.@extc04_description: Crystalline chain gun developed by the Chosen. Projectiles can hit multiple enemies, depending on how crowded they are.
entries.@extc03_description: Prototype isobaric hand cannon, powered by Crystalline capacitors. Deals massive area damage.
